body: Hi Mustapha, Thank you for your update, It worked now.. another question,  why is the default Outside boundary condition for floor is surface (not ground)? And when I run It, the surface become adiabatic because there isn't any surface.. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Ug6ORo4NSNThVFB3Xn21hTur3iZx1idus752wE1sRs89YFrgenz6G*1*Nv339hp08YT4S7tyCCFXz7I-1rQOXyXX**bjcU-X/floor.PNG) And I'm interested in the issue "Fix naming process both for zones and surface #76" to let user naming surfaces especially which have "Outdoor" as Outside boundary condition.. Best Regards, Agus
